languages.text: "Я видел, как ты, ядовитая мокрица, приводил товарищей на смерть на арене. А теперь ты готов пойти с эттфатером против всей Комморры, принять без сомнения жуткую и мучительную смерть? Ты, конечно, все еще недостойный ублюдок, но... Способ уйти ты выбрал достойный".

"I've seen you, you poisonous gnat, leading your comrades to their deaths in the arena. But now you are willing to stand with the Aett-Vater against all of Commorragh, to suffer what is certain to be a gruesome and agonising death? You are still an unworthy scoundrel, of course, but... you have chosen an honourable way out."
languages.original_text: "Я видел, как ты, ядовитая мокрица, приводил товарищей на смерть на арене. А теперь ты готов пойти с эттфатером против всей Комморры, принять без сомнения жуткую и мучительную смерть? Ты, конечно, все еще недостойный ублюдок, но... Способ уйти ты выбрал достойный".

You are still an unworthy scoundrel, of course, but... you have chosen an honourable way out."

traits.locale_text: "I've seen you, you poisonous gnat, leading your comrades to their deaths in the arena. But now you are willing to stand with the Aett-Vater against all of Commorragh, to suffer what is certain to be a gruesome and agonising death? You are still an unworthy scoundrel, of course, but... you have chosen an honourable way out."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「毒ブヨのお前が闘技場で同胞を死に至らしめるのを見てた。だが、今じゃお前はアエット＝ヴァテルに味方して、コモラフ全員敵に回すつもりなんだろ？むごたらしく苦痛に満ちた死を確実に与えるために。もちろん、お前が恥ずべき悪党であることは変わりない。だが…栄光に続く道を選んだ」
languages.original_text: "I've seen you, you poisonous gnat, leading your comrades to their deaths in the arena. But now you are willing to stand with the Aett-Vater against all of Commorragh, to suffer what is certain to be a gruesome and agonising death? You are still an unworthy scoundrel, of course, but... you have chosen an honourable way out."

traits.locale_text: 「毒ブヨのお前が闘技場で同胞を死に至らしめるのを見てた。だが、今じゃお前はアエット＝ヴァテルに味方して、コモラフ全員敵に回すつもりなんだろ？むごたらしく苦痛に満ちた死を確実に与えるために。もちろん、お前が恥ずべき悪党であることは変わりない。だが…栄光に続く道を選んだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我见过你，你这支有毒的臭虫，你曾在竞技场里指挥你的同伴送命。可现在，你竟然愿意与狼领一道，对抗整个科摩罗，哪怕着意味着你将在可怕的痛苦中死亡？是啊，你确实是个不值得尊重的混蛋……但你选择了一种值得尊重的死法。”
languages.original_text: "I've seen you, you poisonous gnat, leading your comrades to their deaths in the arena. But now you are willing to stand with the Aett-Vater against all of Commorragh, to suffer what is certain to be a gruesome and agonising death? You are still an unworthy scoundrel, of course, but... you have chosen an honourable way out."

traits.locale_text: “我见过你，你这支有毒的臭虫，你曾在竞技场里指挥你的同伴送命。可现在，你竟然愿意与狼领一道，对抗整个科摩罗，哪怕着意味着你将在可怕的痛苦中死亡？是啊，你确实是个不值得尊重的混蛋……但你选择了一种值得尊重的死法。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Je vous ai vu mener vos camarades à leur mort dans l'arène, vil serpent. Mais vous êtes aujourd'hui prêt à vous dresser contre tout Commorragh aux côtés de l'aett-vater, au risque de connaître une mort atroce ? Vous êtes toujours une canaille indigne, bien sûr, mais... vous avez choisi une issue honorable. »
languages.original_text: "I've seen you, you poisonous gnat, leading your comrades to their deaths in the arena. But now you are willing to stand with the Aett-Vater against all of Commorragh, to suffer what is certain to be a gruesome and agonising death? You are still an unworthy scoundrel, of course, but... you have chosen an honourable way out."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous ai vu mener vos camarades à leur mort dans l'arène, vil serpent. Mais vous êtes aujourd'hui prêt à vous dresser contre tout Commorragh aux côtés de l'aett-vater, au risque de connaître une mort atroce ? Vous êtes toujours une canaille indigne, bien sûr, mais... vous avez choisi une issue honorable. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Te he visto, gusano venenoso, llevando a tus camaradas a la muerte en combate. ¿Pero ahora estás dispuesto a enfrentarte con el Aett-Vater a todo Commorragh, a sufrir lo que seguramente será una muerte horrible y agonizante? Sigues siendo un canalla, por supuesto, pero... al menos has tomado una salida digna».
languages.original_text: "I've seen you, you poisonous gnat, leading your comrades to their deaths in the arena. But now you are willing to stand with the Aett-Vater against all of Commorragh, to suffer what is certain to be a gruesome and agonising death? You are still an unworthy scoundrel, of course, but... you have chosen an honourable way out."

traits.locale_text: «Te he visto, gusano venenoso, llevando a tus camaradas a la muerte en combate. ¿Pero ahora estás dispuesto a enfrentarte con el Aett-Vater a todo Commorragh, a sufrir lo que seguramente será una muerte horrible y agonizante? Sigues siendo un canalla, por supuesto, pero... al menos has tomado una salida digna».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe Euch gesehen, Miststück, wie Ihr Eure Kameraden in der Arena in den Tod geführt habt. Und jetzt seid Ihr bereit, Euch mit dem Aett-Vater gegen ganz Commorragh zu stellen und einen mit Sicherheit grausamen Tod zu erleiden? Ihr seid natürlich immer noch eine unwürdige Kanaille, aber ... Ihr habt einen ehrenhaften Ausweg gewählt."
languages.original_text: "I've seen you, you poisonous gnat, leading your comrades to their deaths in the arena. But now you are willing to stand with the Aett-Vater against all of Commorragh, to suffer what is certain to be a gruesome and agonising death? You are still an unworthy scoundrel, of course, but... you have chosen an honourable way out."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Euch gesehen, Miststück, wie Ihr Eure Kameraden in der Arena in den Tod geführt habt. Und jetzt seid Ihr bereit, Euch mit dem Aett-Vater gegen ganz Commorragh zu stellen und einen mit Sicherheit grausamen Tod zu erleiden? Ihr seid natürlich immer noch eine unwürdige Kanaille, aber ... Ihr habt einen ehrenhaften Ausweg gewählt."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Arenada yoldaşlarını ölüme sürüklemen gözümden kaçmadı zehirli yılan. Şimdiyse Aett-Vater'la birlikte koskoca Commorragh'a kafa tutmaya, korkunç ve acı verici bir ölüme kucak açmaya razı mısın? Aşağılık itin teki olsan da şerefinle ölmeyi tercih etmişsin."
languages.original_text: "I've seen you, you poisonous gnat, leading your comrades to their deaths in the arena. But now you are willing to stand with the Aett-Vater against all of Commorragh, to suffer what is certain to be a gruesome and agonising death? You are still an unworthy scoundrel, of course, but... you have chosen an honourable way out."

traits.locale_text: "Arenada yoldaşlarını ölüme sürüklemen gözümden kaçmadı zehirli yılan. Şimdiyse Aett-Vater'la birlikte koskoca Commorragh'a kafa tutmaya, korkunç ve acı verici bir ölüme kucak açmaya razı mısın? Aşağılık itin teki olsan da şerefinle ölmeyi tercih etmişsin."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
